Welcome to a guide to the WRES HTTP API

One may use this html and plaintext example to learn the WRES HTTP API. The intended users of the HTTP API are programs that request evaluations, which may be written in any language. For more information on how to set up WRES evaluation configurations as well as how to get help, please visit https://***REMOVED***/redmine/projects/wres-user-support/wiki

If your browser shows a warning regarding the security of this page or if your HTTP client is not able to connect due to certificate trust issues, more information is available at https://***REMOVED***/redmine/projects/wres-user-support/wiki/Import_Certificate_Authority_in_Browser_for_Access_to_WRES_Web_Front-End

If you do not have access to any of the above pages or if your first name is not accepted by the HTTP API please contact the WRES team for help.
